subject: Football
lead_paragraph: D’Brickashaw Ferguson, the No. 4 pick in the 2006 draft, took the long road to becoming an elite offensive tackle, and now one bears his name in Freeport, N.Y.
snippet: D’Brickashaw Ferguson, the No. 4 pick in the 2006 draft, took the long road to becoming an elite offensive tackle, and now one bears his name in Freeport, N.Y.
